Smart Kettle: Create an electric kettle that can connect to your smartphone via Bluetooth or Wi-Fi. This kettle can detect when you wake up or leave the house and automatically start brewing your tea or coffee. You can control the temperature and the timing of the brew through an app on your phone. Additionally, the kettle can keep track of your consumption habits and suggest personalized recommendations for your favorite drinks.

3D Printed Kettle: Design an electric kettle that uses 3D printing technology to create a unique and customizable design. The kettle can be printed with different shapes, colors, and patterns, allowing users to personalize their electric kettle. This kettle can also be made with a non-stick surface, making it easy to clean and maintain.

Solar Powered Kettle: Create an electric kettle that runs on solar power. The kettle can be equipped with solar panels on its lid or body, which can absorb sunlight during the day and provide power for the kettle to brew your tea or coffee. This eco-friendly kettle can help reduce your carbon footprint and save energy costs.

Temperature Control Kettle: Design an electric kettle that allows you to control the temperature of the water to your liking. The kettle can have a temperature display and buttons that allow you to adjust the temperature from 40°C to 100°C. This kettle can also have a built-in thermometer to ensure the water is at the perfect temperature for your tea or coffee.

Smart Scale Kettle: Create an electric kettle that doubles as a smart scale. The kettle can have a built-in scale that can measure your weight, body fat percentage, and other health metrics. The kettle can also track your water consumption habits and provide personalized recommendations for your hydration needs. This kettle can be controlled through an app on your phone, allowing you to monitor your health and wellness on the go.
